title: Output Schema for Create Folder Operation
description: Output schema for the create folder operation in the connector.

createdBy.description: Information about the user who created the item.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

id.description: The unique identifier of the user.

createdDateTime.description: The date and time when the item was created.

eTag.description: The entity tag (ETag) for the item.

id.description: The unique identifier of the item.

lastModifiedBy.description: Information about the user who last modified the item.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

id.description: The unique identifier of the user.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The date and time when the item was last modified.

driveId.description: The unique identifier of the drive.

id.description: The unique identifier of the parent folder.

path.description: The path to the parent folder.

size.description: The size of the item in bytes.

childCount.description: The number of child items in the folder.
